committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the Federal Land Management and Policy Act to restrict certain land exchange authority under that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Land Policy and Management Act to state that public interest requirements for exchange of public lands for facilitating construction or development of any power generating facility that is a major stationary source shall not be satisfied unless certain air quality conditions are met.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Land Management and Policy Act to restrict certain land exchange authority under that Act.
